ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Not ( And(Communication_Skill__c >=0 ,Communication_Skill__c <=5 , Coding_Skill__c >=0 , Coding_Skill__c<=5 , Logical_Skill__c >=0 , Logical_Skill__c <=5, Activeness__c >=0 , Activeness__c<=5) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill all marks and make sure marks should be in between 0 and 5
